document_data.name: Order of the Watchful Lion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Watchful Lion''' was an order of [[crusader]]s dedicated to [[Anhur]]. This organization served as [[Mulhorand]]'s first line of defense. Its members often scout neighboring regions and report important events, areas, and people to their superiors.<ref>
